description: TinyTeX is a custom LaTeX distribution based on TeX Live that is relatively small in size, but functions well in most cases, especially for R users. If you run into the problem of missing LaTeX packages, it should be super clear to you what you need to do (in fact, R users won’t need to do anything). You only install LaTeX packages you actually need.
notes: Please see the full documentation at <https://yihui.org/tinytex/>.
中国大陆地区用户: 国内的 CTAN 镜像 <https://ctan.org/mirrors/mirmon#cn>

This package contains the infraonly scheme of TeX Live, without any LaTeX packages. This is the smallest bundle. If you install this bundle, you may install any other packages via tlmgr (which is a utility included in this variation), e.g., 'tlmgr install latex-bin framed'.
